channel.title: The new ePassport
channel.description: Soon, we'll be going on holiday for the first time since my son was born.  This means that we had to apply for a passport for my 2 year-old, which was a fun process.  Anyway, the passport arrived this morning...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description:
And will it help stop terrorism?
...nope.
item.dc:creator: Ben

item.title: Comment by FUD+00:00
item.description: Now now Ben, you're not supposed to ask that question. Please sit in the corner quietly until the security services can come round and re-educate you.
item.dc:creator: FUD
